Breath of Darkness Down Your Spine.setup:
Put 2 PRESENCE and your Incarna (INCARNA_BREATH_OF_DARKNESS_DOWN_YOUR_SPINE), Unempowered (INCARNA_UNEMPOWERED), on your starting board, 1 PRESENCE and INCARNA_BREATH_OF_DARKNESS_DOWN_YOUR_SPINE in the lowest-numbered Jungle and 1 in the highest-numbered Jungle. innate_power_1.name: leave a trail of deathly silence

tier_4.effect: Move INCARNA_BREATH_OF_DARKNESS_DOWN_YOUR_SPINE to THE_ENDLESS_DARK. It brings 1 Invader (from its land).

tier_3.effect: Add 1 BEASTS.

Dances Up Earthquakes.setup:
Put 1 PRESENCE on your starting board in the highest-numbered land with DAHAN.

You start with your 6 Unique Power Cards and 0 Energy. Set the Quake tokens (QUAKE) nearby.

tier_1.effect: If you have at least 1 IMPENDING_CARD, Add 1 QUAKE in one of your lands.

tier_2.effect: In one of your lands, Defend 1 per IMPENDING_CARD (max. 3).

tier_3.effect: If you have at least 3 IMPENDING_CARD, Add 1 QUAKE in one of your lands.

tier_4.effect: In one of your lands, Defend 1 per IMPENDING_CARD (max. 3).

tier_3.effect: 2 FEAR. In each land where you removed QUAKE: 1 Damage to each Invader.

tier_1.effect: Target spirit may Resolve 1 SLOW Power now.

tier_2.effect: Target Spirit may Reclaim 1 Power Card from their discarded or played cards. (If they Reclaim a card from play, they lose its Elements.)

tier_3.effect: Target Spirit may play a Power Card by paying its cost.

tier_1.effect: Look at the top card of either the Invader Deck of (if relevant) the Event Deck. Return it, then shuffle that desk's top 2 cards. (For the Invader Deck, differing Invader Stages may give away which card is next.)

tier_2.effect: Instead of returning-and-shuffling, you may put the card you looked at on the bottom of its deck. You may not do this for cards specially placed during Setup.

Grinning Trickster Stirs Up Trouble.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the highest-numbered land with DAHAN, and 1 in land #4.

tier_1.effect:
Discard Minor Powers from the desk until you get one that targets a land. Use its text effects on target land immediately, ignoring normal Range and targeting restrictions. All "up to" must be used at max. value. Treat all "OR" as "AND"s.

(It is not considered a card of yours or a card in play. Its effects are treated as performed by this Power, as if its text were copied here.)

tier_2.effect: You may Forget a Power Card to gain the just-used Power Card (to hand) and 1 Energy.

innate_power_2.name: why don't you and then fight

tier_2.effect: Add 1 strife.

tier_3.effect: 1 Invader and 1 DAHAN deal Damage to each other.

tier_1.effect: Choose a Spirit with PRESENCE in target land. They gain a Power Card.

tier_2.effect: 1 Damage per DAHAN OR Push up to 3 DAHAN.
Instead, Gather up to 3 EXPLORER.

innate_power_5.name: stars blaze in the daytime sky

tier_1.effect: 3 FEAR. Gain 1 Energy. Reclaim up to 1 Power Card from play or your discard pile.

Stone's Unyielding Defiance.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the lowest-numbered Mountain without DAHAN; 1 in an adjacent land that has BLIGHT (if possible) or is Sands (if not).

innate_power_1.name: hold the island fast with a bulwark of will

tier_1.effect: When BLIGHT is added to one of your lands, you may pay 2 Energy per BLIGHT to take it from the box instead of from the Blight Card. (Handle any cascade separately.)

tier_2.effect: The cost is 1 Energy instead of 2.

tier_3.effect: When an Event or Blight Card directly Destroy PRESENCE (yours or others'), you may prevent any number of PRESENCE from being Destroyed by paying 1 Energy each. ("Directly" means "not by adding BLIGHT".)

innate_power_2.name: let them break themselves against the stone

tier_1.effect: After Invaders deal1 or more Damage to target land, 2 Damage.

tier_2.effect: Also deal half the Damage Invader did to the land (rounding down).

tier_3.effect: Repeat this Power.

Sun-Bright Whirlwind.setup:
Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the highest-numbered Sands, and 2 in the lowest-numbered Mountain.

You start with your 4 Unique Power Cards and 0 energy.

tier_2.effect: 1 FEAR. Push up to 2 EXPLORER/TOWN.

tier_3.effect: For each Invader Pushed by this Power, 1 Damage in the land it was Pushed to.

Towering Roots of the Jungle.setup: Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in the highest-numbered Jungle without BLIGHT, 1 in the highest-numbered Mountain, and 1 in the highest-numbered Wetland. Put INCARNA_TOWERING_ROOTS_OF_THE_JUNGLE, Unempowered (INCARNA_UNEMPOWERED) side up, in the Jungle with your PRESENCE.

tier_2.effect: Gather up to 1 EXPLORER.

tier_3.effect: Gather up to 1 TOWN.

tier_2.effect: 1 FEAR. Remove 1 EXPLORER/TOWN.

tier_3.effect: 1 FEAR. Remove 1 Invader.

Thunderspeaker.setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in each of the 2 lands with the most DAHAN.

tier_2.effect: Gather up to 1 DAHAN per AIR you have. Push up to 1 DAHAN per SUN you have.
Destroy 1 TOWN for every 2 DAHAN in target land.

tier_3.effect: Destroy 1 CITY for every 3 DAHAN in target land.

Thunderspeaker (Tactician).setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in each of the 2 lands with the most DAHAN.

tier_2.effect: Gather up to 1 DAHAN per AIR you have. Push up to 1 DAHAN per SUN you have.
Destroy 1 TOWN for every 2 DAHAN in target land.

tier_3.effect: Destroy 1 CITY for every 3 DAHAN in target land.

Thunderspeaker (Warrior).setup: Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in each of the 2 lands with the most DAHAN. Replace 1 of your PRESENCE with your Incarna (INCARNA_THUNDERSPEAKER) and 1 DAHAN. Replace MANIFESTATION OF POWER AND FLORY with CALL TO BLOODSHED (Minor Power).

tier_2.effect: Gather up to 1 DAHAN per AIR you have. Push up to 1 DAHAN per SUN you have.

tier_1.effect: 1 FEAR if TOWN/CITY are present. 1 Damage.

tier_2.effect: 1 Damage per DAHAN.

Vengeance as a Burning Plague.setup: 1 of your PRESENCE starts the game already Destroyed. Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in a land with BLIGHT, 1 in a Wetland without DAHAN.

tier_2.effect: +1 Damage per DISEASE.

tier_3.effect: +1 Damage per DISEASE. 1 FEAR per DISEASE (max. 5). Remove 1 DISEASE.

tier_2.effect: 1 Damage.

tier_3.effect: +2 Damage.

Vital Strength of the Earth.setup: Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 2 in the highest-numbered Mountain,1 in the highest-numbered Jungle.

tier_1.effect: Once this turn, Target Spirit may Repeat 1 Power Card with Energy cost of 1 or less.

tier_2.effect: Instead, the Energy cost limit is 3 or less.

tier_3.effect: Instead, the Energy cost limit is 6 or less.

Vital Strength of the Earth (Resilience).setup: Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 2 in the highest-numbered Mountain,1 in the highest-numbered Jungle.

tier_1.effect: Once this turn, Target Spirit may Repeat 1 Power Card with Energy cost of 1 or less.

tier_2.effect: Instead, the Energy cost limit is 3 or less.

tier_3.effect: Instead, the Energy cost limit is 6 or less.

Vital Strength of the Earth (Might).setup: Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 2 in the highest-numbered Mountain,1 in the highest-numbered Jungle.

innate_power_1.name: earth moves with vigor and might

tier_1.effect: You may plan an additional Power Card by paying 1 Energy plus it's cost. (Its Elements apply for the rest of this Innate Power's thresholds.)

tier_2.effect: You do +1 Damage with each Damage-dealing Power you use this turn.

tier_3.effect: You do +1 Damage with each Damage-dealing Power you use this turn.

Vital Strength of the Earth (Nourishing).setup: Put 3 PRESENCE on your starting board: 2 in the highest-numbered Mountain,1 in the highest-numbered Jungle. Replace YEAR OF PERFECT STILLNESS with VORACIOUS GROWTH (Minor Power).

tier_1.effect: Once this turn, Target Spirit may Repeat 1 Power Card with Energy cost of 1 or less.

tier_2.effect: Instead, the Energy cost limit is 3 or less.

tier_3.effect: Instead, the Energy cost limit is 6 or less.

tier_2.effect: Add 1 VITALITY.

tier_3.effect: Each DAHAN has +2 Health while in target land. If target land has at least 2 DAHAN, add 1 DAHAN.

Volcano Looming High.setup: Put 1 PRESENCE and 1 BADLANDS on your starting board in a Mountain of your choice. Push all DAHAN from that land.

tier_1.effect: In one land within 1_RANGE, X Damage.

tier_2.effect: X FEAR.

tier_3.effect: In each land within 1_RANGE, 4 Damage. Add 1 BLIGHT to target land; doing so does not Destroy your PRESENCE.

tier_4.effect: In each land within 2_RANGE, +4 Damage. In each land adjacent to the target, add 1 BLIGHT if it doesn't have any.

innate_power_2.name: powered by the furnace of the earth

tier_2.effect: Gain a Power Card.

tier_3.effect: Move up to 2 of your PRESENCE from other lands to target land.

tier_4.effect: Return up to 2 of your Destroyed PRESENCE to your PRESENCE tracks.

Wandering Voice Keens Delirium.setup:
Put 2 PRESENCE on your starting board: 1 in land #6 and 1 in land #7. Put INCARNA_WANDERING_VOICE_KEENS_DELIRIUM, Unempowered (INCARNA_UNEMPOWERED) side up, on your starting board in land #6.

You start with your 4 Unique Power Cards and 0 Energy.

tier_2.effect: You may Push INCARNA_WANDERING_VOICE_KEENS_DELIRIUM.

tier_3.effect: You may Push INCARNA_WANDERING_VOICE_KEENS_DELIRIUM.

tier_2.effect: 1 DAMAGE per SUN you have, to Invaders with STRIFE only.

tier_3.effect: For each SUN MOON pair you have, Destroy 1 Invader with Strife.

Wounded Waters Bleeding.setup:
On your starting board, put 2 PRESENCE in a land with BLIGHT, then put 2 PRESENCE and 1 BLIGHT (from the box) in the highest-numbered land with a TOWN setup symbol.

You start with your 4 Unique Power Cards and 4 Energy. Set your 4 Healing Cards nearby.

tier_2.effect: 1 FEAR. Push up to 2 TOWN/PRESENCE/BEASTS.

tier_3.effect: In one land pushed into, Downgrade all TOWN and all CITY.

tier_2.effect: 1 Damage. Add 1 BEASTS.

tier_3.effect: 1 FEAR. 4 Damage. Add 1 DISEASE.

innate_power_3.name: call to a fastness of renewal

tier_2.effect: Defend 3 or Downgrade 1 Invader.

tier_3.effect: Add 1 BEASTS.

tier_4.effect: If at least 2 DAHAN are present, replace 1 Invader with 1 DAHAN.

tier_2.effect: 2 FEAR if Invaders are present.

tier_3.effect: 1 EXPLORER and 1 TOWN/DAHAN do Damage, to other Invaders only.

tier_4.effect: For each BEASTS: Push 1 EXPLORER and 1 TOWN/DAHAN.
